text:
@realDonaldTrump Oh, please; spare us your manufactured indignation.  You don't care about the statues; you probably don't even know who most of them are.

This is just a distraction from the rising deaths from covid-19 and your shameful acquiescence to Russia putting a bounty on our soldiers.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
